summary: Five new spells, giving you the ability to call your housecarls to your side. Never lose Lydia again!
descriptionHtml:
[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]

This is a quick mod I threw together, based off of a mechanic developed for my voiced companion mod, [U][B][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19348]Atvir Dres: The Last Prince of Tear[/url][/B][/U]. It adds five new spells:

-Call Lydia
-Call Argis
-Call Calder
-Call Iona
-Call Jordis

All of the spells are available from spellbooks found in the master bedroom of the associated home. Additionally, Balgruuf will grant the player \"Call Lydia\" upon returning from slaying the dragon attacking the Western Watch Tower, potentially rendering that spellbook redundant (no harm done, though - just pawn it or throw it away).

Feel free to use this script in your own creations; all I ask is the appropriate credit should you choose to release a mod including my script to the public.

[b]CHANGELOG[/b]

1.1

-Fixed an empty property in Balgruuf\'s spell-awarding script.
author: JanusForbeare
